duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage client's video investments and assist in creating and executing media strategies.
Train and manage the workloads of Associates and Negotiators, review documents and reports prepared by them.
Develop POVs for clients and assist in upfront negotiations.
Allocate budgets to media partners based on research and client goals.
Oversee the evaluation of media plans for National TV linear and alternative video.
Enter buys into MBOX and ensure system reflects accurate buys.
Monitor network buys daily based on audience delivery data to insure delivery in flight.
Assist Manager in providing management with market conditions/changes and negotiate pricing.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Media, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
